Package com.company

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.company.Player
public class Player extends Object
Class specified for playable character It implements required player settings
Author:
Igor Zeitz

    Checking if the level should end If a player position is equal to the door position it will display an ending menu and change the gameOn variable to ending value

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(Controls controls)
      Player class constructor Needed for appropriate textures while pressing movement keys
      Parameters:
      controls - used for displaying different textures that represent different movement directions

  • Method Details

    • animation

      public void animation()
      Allows hero to animate while moving

    • playerUpdate

      public int playerUpdate()
      It allows updating player position
      Returns:
      returns int values form 0 to 4: 1 = player is going up, 2 = player is going down, 3 = player is going left, 4 = player is going right, 0 = player is standing

    • loadPlayerTextures

      public void loadPlayerTextures()
      Method that assigns textures to appropriate directions

    • drawPlayer

      public void drawPlayer(Graphics2D g2)
      Drawing player textures on specific x and y position It allows to see the player movement
      Parameters:
      g2 -

    • drawDistance

      public void drawDistance(Graphics2D g2)
      It draws player view distance
      Parameters:
      g2 -

    • collision

      public void collision()
      Collision checking method It allows player to move if the colliding tile collision is false. If texture collision is true player can't move in that texture position

    • endingCollision

      public void endingCollision()
      Checking if the level should end If a player position is equal to the door position it will display an ending menu and change the gameOn variable to ending value
